des: "This applesauce is delicious! I make it for my younger brother all the time and he loves it - and he hates canned applesauce!"
ins: In a saucepan, combine apples, water, sugar, and cinnamon. Cover, and cook over medium heat for 15 to 20 minutes, or until apples are soft. Allow to cool, then mash with a fork or potato masher.
